QuestData.Title: Korok the Colossus
QuestData.Description: The monstrosity has fallen, granting a brief reprieve to the Forsaken soldiers on the front lines.$B$BTake Korok's second head and return it to Forward Commander Onslaught at Forsaken Forward Command.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Korok's Second Head to Forward Commander Onslaught at Forsaken Forward Command in the Ruins of Gilneas.
QuestData.RewardText: That towering behemoth has killed hundreds of Forsaken soldiers. You've done a great thing, $n.
